subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In an era of parity in the N.F.L., more and more kicks are sailing between the uprights. The league has occasionally tried to slow the trend, but ideas for rules changes are running out.
snippet: In an era of parity in the N.F.L., more and more kicks are sailing between the uprights. The league has occasionally tried to slow the trend, but ideas for rules changes are running out.
